kadirgamar ghathanaye sakakaruwakuta wyaja namakin handunumpathak sakasu nelumkulame grama niladhariya gana pulul parikshanayak samantha ileperuma hitapu widesha katayuthu amathi lakshman kadirgamar mahatha ghathanaya kirime siddhiyata adala el.ti.ti.ee. sakakaruwaku hata wyaja namayakin handunumpathak sakas karadi thrasthawadi kriyawalata aadhara anubala dima sambandhayen athadanguwata ganu labu wawniyawa nelumkulame grama niladhariwaraya randawum niyoga matha randawa thabagena pulul parikshanayak pawathwimata katayuthu yoda athi bawa kolambaa aparadha kottasaya warthawak gonu karamin kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha danum dimak kaleya. el.ti.ti.ee. sanwidhanaye buddhi anshaye prabala samajikayan samaga sambandhatha pawathwa athi sakakaru pasugiya sapthambar 03 da wawuniyawa polisiye niladharin kandayamak athadanguwata gena wadidura parikshanayanta thaman wetha bara kala bawada danwu aparadha kottasaya kolambaa nagaraye thrasthawadi kriya sidu kirimata sakakarugen wenath udaw upakara labi athi bawata karunu helidaraw wi athi bawath ee pilibandawa parikshanawaladi awadhanaya yomu kara athi bawath kiya sitiyeya.
